#summary Intro Page.

= Introduction =

WiiWare/VC Manager lets you easily manage the WiiWare and VC .wad files on your SD card or HD. 

*Remove wads from destination
*get info about wads on source or destination
*Add wads from source to destination


= Details =

WiiWare/VC Manager use the naming convention {{{ {channeltitle}_{titleid}.wad }}} to lookup info about the game. If the name is not in this format you can still move the file from source to destination, you just won't get any info or pretty picture

To get you wads file in the correct format use the excellent program [http://code.google.com/p/showmiiwads/downloads/list Showmiiwads]
